EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Velocity 2018 last week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello{{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at Velocity 2018 <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/velocity/vl-ca]]>. We hope you found it as enlightening as we did! So many industry leaders and organizations of all sizes shared their wisdom and experience around what it takes to build and manage distributed systems. Pivotal can help you get even deeper into exploring topics like resiliency, observability, and security. Want more? Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-san-jose-q218]]> to pick up new skills and ideas for building better software, faster. Register here <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-san-jose-q218]]> with the following discount code to get $100 off the posted price: Attendee_Event_100.
Looking for more insights about DevOps-related technologies including containers, Kubernetes, and serverless? Curious to learn more about concepts like continuous delivery, declarative configuration, and building stateful applications? For all of this <[[https://content.pivotal.io/velocity-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-san-jose-q218]]> and more, our website has a wealth of articles <[[https://content.pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-san-jose-q218]]>, whitepapers <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-san-jose-q218]]> and talks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-san-jose-q218]]> to get you started.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
